member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information for image-related events during HTML rendering.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs.#ctor(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ImageEventArgs class.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs.Image
member.summary: Gets the image related to the event.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs.IsProcessed
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the image has been processed.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs.Url
member.summary: Gets or sets the desired URL of the image.
member.remarks: This URL will be written in the output HTML file.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.RenderHtmlEventArgs
member.summary: Provides information to various rendering events of the HtmlExporter, such as BeginRenderHead, EndRenderHead, and so on.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.RenderHtmlEventArgs.#ctor(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RenderHtmlEventArgs class.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MhtmlExporter
member.summary: Exports MindFusion reports to MHTML files.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase
member.summary: The base class for HTML exporters.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HtmlExporterBase class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.Export(MindFusion.Reporting.Report,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an output file representing the specified report.
member.param: A reference to the report that will be exported.
The full path to the output file.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.Export(MindFusion.Reporting.Report,System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Exports the specified report as an HTML.
member.param: A reference to the report that will be exported.
The destination StringBuilder where the report contents will be rendered.
member.remarks: This method does not raise any events nor does it use many of the HTML-related properties of the HtmlExporter class. Check the individual property remarks for details.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.OnProcessImage(System.Object,MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the ProcessImage event of the rendering graphics.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.OnProcessImage(MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs)
member.param: An object providing the event data.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.MetaTags
member.summary: Gets a list with the names and values of the meta-tags to be included in the resulting HTML.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.Title
member.summary: Gets or sets the title of the resulting HTML.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.PageSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the page size.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.PageOrientation
member.summary: Gets or sets the page orientation.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.Margins
member.summary: Gets or sets the page margins.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.ProcessImage
member.summary: Raised when the underlying HTML is rendered in order to process a referenced image.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.BeginRenderHead
member.summary: Raised before the <head> tag contents are being rendered, but after the tag itself has been appended.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.EndRenderHead
member.summary: Raised after the <head> tag contents are being rendered, but before the closing tag has been appended.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.BeginRenderReport
member.summary: Raised within the <body> right before rendering the report.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.EndRenderReport
member.summary: Raised within the <body> right after rendering the report.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics
member.summary: An IGraphics implementation that renders some graphics as HTML contents. The HtmlGraphics class renders within a StringBuider instance.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.#ctor(System.Text.StringBuilder)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HtmlGraphics class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.DrawFormattedText(MindFusion.Text.Text,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.RectangleF,System.Drawing.StringAlignment,System.Drawing.StringAlignment,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Renders the formatted text identified by the specified layout using the information in the specified hint in the current graphics.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.CreateTextDiv(System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Font,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.StringAlignment)
member.summary: Creates a <DIV> tag corresponding to a text with the specified characteristics.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.DrawBorder(MindFusion.Reporting.Border,System.Drawing.RectangleF)
member.summary: Renders the specified border in the specified destination rectangle.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.ToHtmlDashStyle(System.Drawing.Drawing2D.DashStyle)
member.summary: Converts the specified DashStyle to its HTML representation.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.GetSolidColor(System.Drawing.Brush)
member.summary: Retrieves the solid color from the specified brush.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.ToClient(System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Transforms the specified point to client coordinates.
member.remarks: The coordinates supplied to the various methods of this graphics class are in document coordinates (that is, in the coordinates specified in the PageUnit property). Through the use of this method you can convert those coordinates to the pixel coordinates expected by the target HTML.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.ToClient(System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: Transforms the specified point to client coordinates.
member.remarks: The coordinates supplied to the various methods of this graphics class are in document coordinates (that is, in the coordinates specified in the PageUnit property). Through the use of this method you can convert those coordinates to the pixel coordinates expected by the target HTML.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.ToClient(System.Single)
member.summary: Transforms the specified value to client coordinates.
member.remarks: The coordinates supplied to the various methods of this graphics class are in document coordinates (that is, in the coordinates specified in the PageUnit property). Through the use of this method you can convert those coordinates to the pixel coordinates expected by the target HTML.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.ImageToBase64(System.Drawing.Image)
member.summary: Converts the specified image to a base-64 string.

member.param: An object providing the event data.

member.summary: The StringBuilder instance this objects renders to.

member.summary: An internal graphics object used for measuring, transformations and stat tracking.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.innerBitmap
member.summary: A bitmap used in the creation of the inner Graphics.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.Transform
member.remarks: Only the translation component of this object is taken into consideration.

member.name: E:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporterBase.HtmlGraphics.ProcessImage
member.summary: Raised when the underlying HTML is rendered in order to process a referenced image.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the MhtmlExporter class.

member.param: An object providing the event data.

member.name: T:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter
member.summary: Exports MindFusion reports to HTML files.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the HtmlExporter class.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter.Export(MindFusion.Reporting.Report,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an HTML file representing the specified report.
member.param: A reference to the report that will be exported.
The full path to the HTML file.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter.OnProcessImage(MindFusion.Reporting.Export.ImageEventArgs)
member.param: An object providing the event data.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter.CreateDirectory(System.String)
member.summary: Recursively creates all missing directories in the specified path.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter.EmbedImages
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to embed images in the HTML or copy them in a specified directory.
member.remarks: This property is ignored when exporting directly to a StringBuilder. In this case the images are always embedded in the resulting HTML.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter.ImageFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the directory where the images referenced in the HTML should be copied.
member.remarks: This property is ignored when exporting directly to a StringBuilder.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.HtmlExporter.RootFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the folder of the target HTML.
member.remarks: If images are not embedded and ImageFolder is a relative path, this parameter is used as a root.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Abstract
member.summary: The "abstract" tag. Define a secondary description.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Author
member.summary: The "author" tag. Records the name of the author of the document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Classification
member.summary: The "classification" tag. Classify the site into the appropriate category.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Copyright
member.summary: The "copyright" tag. Used to include copyright information in the document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Description
member.summary: The "description" tag. Some search engines pick up this description to show with the results of searches.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Distribution
member.summary: The "distribution" tag. Declares whether a document is available to the web or on an intranet. Possible content values are "Global", "Local", "IU".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.DocClass
member.summary: The "doc-class" tag. Indicates completion status of document. Possible values are "Completed", "Draft", "Living Document", "Published".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.DocRights
member.summary: The "doc-rights" tag. Indicates copyright status of document. Possible values are "Copywritten Work", "Private", "Public", "Public Domain".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.DocType
member.summary: The "doc-type" tag. Specifies type of document. Possible content values are "Confidential Company Papers", "eZine", "Government", "Journal", "Manuscript", "Paper", "Private", "Public", "Web Page", "White Paper".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Expires
member.summary: The "expires" tag. Expiration date of the document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Generator
member.summary: The "generator" tag. The name of the program that created the document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Googlebot
member.summary: The "googlebot" tag. Define pages to be excluded from googebot indexing. Possible content values are "all", "index, follow", "noindex, follow", "index, nofollow", "noindex, nofollow", "none", "nosnippet", "noarchive".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Keywords
member.summary: The "keywords" tag. Inform search engines what your web site or page is about.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.MSSmartTagsPreventParsing
member.summary: The "MSSmartTagsPreventParsing" tag. Use this tag to prevent any Microsoft product from automatically generating smart tags. Possible content value is "TRUE".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Owner
member.summary: The "owner" tag. Define the owner of the page or site.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Rating
member.summary: The "rating" tag. A simple rating for a site.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Refresh
member.summary: The "refresh" tag. Indicates the document displays for a specified amount of time before switching to a new URL. The content value should be in the format "n;url", where "n" is the number of seconds to wait before loading the URL specified by "url".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.ReplyTo
member.summary: The "reply-to" tag. Email address of contact for document.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.ResourceType
member.summary: The "resource-type" tag. Indicates the type of web resource. Possible content value is "document".

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.RevisitAfter
member.summary: The "revisit-after" tag. Defines how often search engine spiders should revisit your site.

member.name: F:MindFusion.Reporting.Export.MetaTagNames.Robots
member.summary: The "robots" tag. Defines pages to be excluded from robot indexing. Possible values are "all", "index, follow", "noindex, follow", "index, nofollow", "noindex, nofollow", "none", "noimageindex".
